entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Provide API in Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting to allow apps to know when they're being run in the context of a tool #85739
  • Crossgen2 work for .NET 8 #85736
    8.0.0
  • PipeReader.CopyToAsync(Stream) sometimes does a zero length write #85733
  • Follow up with removing INLINE_GETTHREAD_CONSTANT_POOL pattern, in the context of coreclr #85732
  • Adding more information and events to System.Net.Http telemetry #85729
    Future
  • [mono] "opcode 940 load_gotaddr" error when AOTing on android-x86 #85724
    8.0.0
  • MAUI Blazor App fails on load for adhoc release #85722
  • ARM64 - Test failure `Interop/COM/ComWrappers/API/ComWrappersTests/ComWrappersTests.sh` #85721
  • Process.WaitForExit(Int32) sometimes throws AggregateException on macOS #85717
  • ComActivator throws NotSupportedException when oleview tries to create instance #85715
  • Cannot access a disposed object. Object name: System.Net.Security.SslStream #85712
  • [API Proposal]: Change `System.Numerics.IPowerFunctions` #85707
  • Perf is not working for JITed code in DotNet (Mono Runtime) #85706
  • Double precision seems wired when I try to call ToString("F19") for number with less then 19 digit #85700
  • Regressions in System.MathBenchmarks.Single #85711
  • Use `IndexOfAnyValues<string>` in Regex #85693
    8.0.0

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Add System.Web.IHtmlString and System.Web.HtmlString to System.Web.HttpUtility #83477
    8.0.0
  • Publishing NativeAOT fails on Windows if $env:VSINSTALLDIR doesn't have a trailing slash #85737
  • Suboptimal code generated with small-sized stackalloc #64873
    Future
  • IJW tests (using managed C++) fail to compile with Crossgen2 #38096
    Future
  • Support ReadyToRun on mixed-mode assemblies #12667
    Future
  • CG2 Outerloop Test Failure: Interop\StructMarshalling\PInvoke\MarshalStructAsLayoutExp\MarshalStructAsLayoutExp.cmd #43461
    6.0.0
  • Test Failure JIT\\Directed\\Convert\\out_of_range_fp_to_int_conversions\\out_of_range_fp_to_int_conversions.cmd #49184
    8.0.0
  • CG2 runtime crash in JIT\Regression\JitBlue\Runtime_34170\Runtime_34170\Runtime_34170.cmd #53560
    8.0.0
  • Crossgen2 error on arm64 for GitHub_17777 #59040
    8.0.0
  • If the enforcepgo script fails, it doesn't fail the CoreCLR build #35089
    Future
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\generics\\Layout\\General\\Base02b_seq_ser\\Base02b_seq_ser.cmd #76862
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\Runtime_45557\\Runtime_45557\\Runtime_45557.cmd #79207
  • Test failure: crossgen2 crash building HardwareIntrinsics tests #82114
  • [API Proposal]: Rename IndexOfAnyValues #82622
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: System.BadImageFormatException: The file is not a ReadyToRun image #83409
    8.0.0
  • System.IO.Tests.RandomAccess_NoBuffering.ReadUsingSingleBuffer timing out #85659
  • System.Net.Http.Tests.WarningHeaderValueTest.GetWarningLength_DifferentInvalidScenarios_AllReturnZero failing in CI #85687
    8.0.0
  • Adding more information and events to System.Net.Http telemetry #83734
    8.0.0
  • Failures in System.Net.Mail.Tests.SmtpClientTest tests #85637
  • [API Proposal]: Marshaller type to support SafeHandle in source-generated marshalling without hard-coding in the generator #74035
    8.0.0
  • CipherMode.CFB does not Encrypt without changing FeedbackSize (DES) #85079
    8.0.0
  • Constants in System.Numerics are Invoking "new" with every call #85713
  • ARM64 - Test failure `AdvSimd_ro` timeout #85720
  • System.Text.Json Serialize wrong result #85710
  • How to run src/tests/tracing standalone? #85708
  • Decompression Streams reading beyond compressed data. #84299
  • Arm64: Add back the annotation in JitDisasm with the local var (+offset) #84504
    8.0.0
  • Please support for Marshal.GetDelegateForFunctionPointer<T>() in Dotnet 7.0 / 8.0 #85699
  • support building mono on x64 as it gets built on s390x #62440
    8.0.0
  • LoggerMessageAttribute extension to support Exception messages #84233
    Future
  • [wasm] System.Runtime.Tests exiting silently on main #83443
  • [browser] V8 dying in the middle of application #85675
    8.0.0
  • Generalize Arm64 ldr/str to ldp/stp optimization #81278
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'node->OperIs(GT_DIV, GT_UDIV, GT_MOD)' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #85630
  • error BLAZORSDK1001 in wasm tests #85354
    8.0.0
  • CustomMain NativeAot test doesn't support cross-arch compilation #82320
  • [NativeAOT] When will NativeAOT support shared CoreCLR? #84237

PullRequests

Created

  • Annotate IHtmlString.ToHtmlString's return as nullable #85742
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Clean up dead code in illink targets #85741
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • Upgrade System.Reflection.Metadata version #85738
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • Address `TODO-FIELD`s and delete quirks #85735
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [JIT] Fix - Do not remove `CAST` nodes on assignment if the `LCL_VAR` is a parameter. #85734
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Servicing docs improvements #85731
    documentation, area-Infrastructure
  • [draft][browser] loader #85730
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Refactor physical promotion in preparation of generalized assignment decomposition #85728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid reporting frozen segments in GetGenerationBounds #85727
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Keep `this` alive across the native call for VTable-based source-generation #85723
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Expose various floating-point intrinsics for Avx512F and Avx512DQ #85716
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • Add negative test for creating instances of function pointers #85709
    area-System.Reflection
  • [wasm] PackedSimd, add floating point methods #85705
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Fix GetNonGCHeapBounds #85702
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [browser] fix job queue timespan calculation #85696
    Servicing-consider, needs-area-label, 7.0.x
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • CI: Fix running the workaround for `NuGet-Migrations` issue #85692
    area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [NativeAOT] Use inline relocs for win-arm64 INLINE_GETTHREAD #85689
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add back IHtmlString to System.Web.HttpUtility #85673
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix building ReferenceTrackerRuntime.cpp in Interop tests #85682
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Rename IndexOfAnyValues to SearchValues #85686
    area-System.Buffers, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Move DispatchMap pointer to MethodTable #85698
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Simplify SelectArrayIterator method #85695
    area-System.Linq
  • [wasm] Use the docker images with floating tags #85388
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Fix liveness for partial defs of parent locals #85654
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete `GT_FIELD` #85568
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix AreFlagsSetToZeroCmp to not consider unsupported formats #85714
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] Add status code and exception info to System.Net.Http events #84806
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.7
  • JIT: Improve block unrolling, enable AVX-512 #85501
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Add status code and exception info to System.Net.Http events #84807
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.18
  • [release/7.0-staging] Tar: Add missing TarFile.CreateFromDirectoryAsync roundtrip tests #84856
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Formats.Tar, 7.0.x
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #85719
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #85718
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add new SafeHandleMarshaller type to provide out-of-generator marshalling support. #85419
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Change default CFB feedback size for DES.Create() #85214
    area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • Remove S.Sec.Crypto.Algorithms package dependency #85701
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [browser] es6 test main #85542
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Directory.Build.props: restore previous behavior when targetting 'other' TargetOSes from Windows. #85246
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-staging] Skip DllImportSearchPathsTest on wasm #85588
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, 6.0.x
  • Clean up dead code in ILCompiler targets #85618
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update branding to 7.0.7 #85670
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 6.0.18 #85669
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Arm64: Add back the annotation in JitDisasm with the local var (+offset) #85671
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support building a mono-based .NET Runtime on x64 #68424
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` faster encoding for change case. #85516
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Implement Micrososoft.Bcl.Cryptography without System.Security.Cryptography.Algorithms #85683
    area-System.Security
  • Allocate Array.Empty<> on a frozen segment (NonGC heap) #85559
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [browser] fix job queue timespan calculation #85677
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Shuffle some `MethodTable` flags #85634
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • offers the synchronous part of start and stop in IHostedService to run concurrently #85191
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Avoid S.R.I.RuntimeInformation package dependency #85642
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Use monotonic clock in wasm, emscripten has it now #85660
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Skip stp/ldp only for unwind portion of prolog/epilog #85657
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Fix Assertion failed 'node->OperIs(GT_DIV, GT_UDIV, GT_MOD)' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #85664
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add `count` and `sum` to Histogram for System.Diagnostics.Metrics #85595
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • [wasi] Disable failing tests to get CI green #85681
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-VM-meta-mono, os-wasi
  • [wasm] WBT: Renable blazor lazy loading test #85685
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Disable some System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests #85678
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [release/6.0-staging] define UNW_AARCH64 aliases conditionally #84873
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.18
  • [release/7.0-staging] define UNW_AARCH64 aliases conditionally #84874
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr, 7.0.7

Updated

  • Add message details for AmbiguousMatchException #84512
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Create a createdump static library for single-file dump generation #84864
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Avoid bloom filter checks for IndexOfAnyExcept in ProbabilisticMap #85203
    area-System.Buffers, 8.0.0
  • Improve IndexOfAnyValues throughput for needles with 0 #84184
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • Zip.Unix: don't hang when creating zip file from directory with named pipe. #85301
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Allow Base64Decoder to ignore space chars, add IsValid methods and tests #79334
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, partner-impact
  • Fix TimeZoneInfo Perf #85615
    area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • Make dependency on lld optional #85667
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use Roslyn Source Generator Testing SDK to test interop source generators #84867
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-enhancement, source-generator
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • SHA3 #84132
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Allow forward sub to reorder trees throwing the same single exception #85647
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Intrinsify Unsafe.Read/Write, handle struct BitCast #85562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Transform indirect calls to direct ones in the importer #85197
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable more ILLink tests in NativeAOT #85651
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests - use the new sdk with templates #85498
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono

    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Templatize `enregisterLocalVars` in various methods of LSRA #85144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow the user to control the MaxVectorTBitWidth and PreferredVectorBitWidth #85551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Add GenericTypeParameterBuilder implementation and save a generic type into assembly. #85658

  • [JIT]: Inline TLS field access for GC type #85619

    area-Debugger-mono

    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution

    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • This fixes an issue with gradual decommit in scenarios where we have … #84975
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` normalization. #85510
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
